1.Name: Game of Life
1.Description: A simple implementation of Conway's Game of Life, built with React.

2.Name: Consumer Goods
2.Description:
Mock E-commerce site.
 
Users can search for, filter, and browse products, and edit the contents of a viewable cart, which can be accessed from any page.

3.Name: Knight's Travails
3.Description:
A variation on the classic 'Knight's Tour' chess problem.
 Given any start and end point, the algorithm finds the shortest path.

4.Name: Battleship
4.Description: A player vs bot implementation of the classic strategy game, built with Vanilla JS + Webpack.

5.Name: React Design Patterns
5.Description: A series of common React design patterns with notated code and toy examples
